title: SMC_SetInterpreterStartPosition (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_SetInterpreterStartPosition
This function block copies the actual position from the bus task
to the task of the
SMC_NCInterpreter
, in a task safe manner.
Usually, the position is computed based on the actual position
of the drives and the kinematic forward transformation.
To be called from the bus task.

rows:
The current poition of the machine as output by the forward
transformation
